und.value: [caption id="attachment_373" align="alignleft" width="300" caption="Protecting our water supply"][/caption] Water Security is the protection of adequate water supplies for food, fiber, industrial, and residential needs for expanding populations, which requires maximizing water-use efficiency, developing new supplies, and protecting water reserves in event of scarcity due to natural, manmade, or technological hazards.
